title: Venison Bacon Burgers Recipe
description: An easy venison burger recipe. Crisp, crumbly bacon is mixed into seasoned ground venison to make the best juicy burgers you've ever tasted.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Meat and Poultry Pork Venison Bacon Burgers 4.8 (243) 193 Reviews 13 Photos These tasty, juicy venison burgers make a change from normal beef patties. Submitted by Lupin Pooter Updated on November 20, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 13 13 13 13 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 20 mins Additional Time: 20 mins Total Time: 1 hr Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 6 slices bacon, minced 2 tablespoons olive oil 2 shallots, minced 1 teaspoon minced garlic 2 pounds ground venison 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley salt and pepper to taste 1 large egg, beaten to mix 6 hamburger buns Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until browned and crispy. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pour bacon and grease into a heatproof bowl and allow to cool. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Heat oil in a skillet. Add shallots and garlic. Cook and stir until softened, about 3 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Mix with bacon. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Mix venison with cooled bacon mixture. Season with Worcestershire sauce, parsley, salt, and pepper. Stir in egg until evenly combined. Refrigerate for 20 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat. Shape venison mixture into 6 patties. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Grill to desired doneness. Serve on toasted hamburger buns with your favorite toppings. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 323 home cooks made it! Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Venison Bacon Burgers 01 of 13 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 13 Photo by  Edward Quigley 01/06/2021 03 of 13 Photo by  Joseph Jackson 01/14/2020 04 of 13 Photo by  Linda Harris Camps 12/16/2019 05 of 13 Photo by  Tyler Earl Laughbaum 02/11/2018 06 of 13 Photo by  Arlenya 01/03/2017 07 of 13 Photo by  BillyT 11/30/2014 INCREDIBLE!!! Didn't change anything. Best burgers I've ever had. Thanks!! 08 of 13 Photo by  Mitchell 05/04/2014 This was my first time cooking venison burgers, and my god was it delicious! I traded the shallots for onion powder but everything else stayed the same. If you cook in a cast iron skillet the burgers come out perfect. Will definitely do this again 09 of 13 Photo by  KatieW 12/29/2012 10 of 13 Photo by  Sue Ann Eggermont 03/30/2011 Very yummy and stayed moist, baked in the oven as suggested by other reviewer didn't have grill out yet. 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Mom's Legendary Stuffed Hamburgers 32 Ratings Grilled Mushroom Swiss Burgers 55 Ratings Summer Feta Burger with Gourmet Cheese Spread 51 Ratings Tex-Mex Burger with Cajun Mayo 467 Ratings The Juiciest Hamburgers Ever 78 Ratings Grilled Bacon-Wrapped Corn on the Cob 85 Ratings Grilled Chicken Foil Packets 48 Ratings Crunchy Coconut and Lime Burgers 26 Ratings Sheboygan Grilled Brats 94 Ratings LaMama Raisin Burgers 8 Ratings Jalapeno-Garlic-Onion Cheeseburgers 75 Ratings Green Chili Chicken Burgers 92 Ratings Fish on a Plank 30 Ratings Easy Bacon, Onion, and Cheese-Stuffed Burgers 112 Ratings Beer Burgers 107 Ratings Killer Bacon-Cheese Dogs 70 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
